subject: fix: make install/update buttons truly exclusive by audience
body:
- Update: only shows for installed PWA users (isInstalled && hasUpdate)
- Install: only shows for non-installed users (!isInstalled && shouldShowInstall)

Browser users don't need "Update" since network-first caching means
hard reload already gets the latest code. The SW update is only
meaningful for installed PWAs where the SW controls the experience.
